BalanceIndicator.syncMessage: Balance may be out-of-date while wallet syncs with ledger.
BalanceIndicator.title: Balance

BuildGiftForm.enterPin: For this amount your PIN is required
BuildGiftForm.errorFee: Please reserve 0.01 MOB for transaction fee.
BuildGiftForm.errorSyncBeforeSending: Wallet must sync with ledger before sending gifts.
BuildGiftForm.giftConfirmationDescription: Please check and confirm the amount of the gift
BuildGiftForm.giftCreated: Gift created. Your balance will update shortly.
BuildGiftForm.mobWillBeSent: MOB will be sent to the gift code below after you view, secure and confirm.
BuildGiftForm.positiveValidation: A positive, non-zero amount is required to gift MOB.
BuildGiftForm.positiveValidationRequired: A positive, non-zero amount is required to gift MOB.

BuildGiftPanel.deleteDialogDescription: If this gift has been claimed, or if you do not want to store the gift code and value anymore, you can delete the gift code here.
BuildGiftPanel.deleteDialogText: Deleting will not cancel the gift. A user must claim the gift with the gift code.
BuildGiftPanel.description: Use this screen to create redeemable gift codes of MOB. To create a gift code, input the value to gift, confirm the amount of the gift, and secure the gift's secret code.
BuildGiftPanel.manageGiftCodesDescription: When creating a gift, this wallet stores its gift code and value. Click to copy the gift code to the clipboard at any time. To stop storing the gift code, click the trash can icon to delete.
BuildGiftPanel.title: Create Gifts of MOB

ChangePasswordView.description: Changing your passphrase will change how we lock this wallet. Always use strong (unguessable) passphrases and change them regularly.
ChangePasswordView.instructions: To change your current passphrase, please enter your current passphrase and your new passphrase.
ChangePasswordView.passwordMax: Passphrases cannot be more than 99 characters.
ChangePasswordView.passwordMin: New Passphrase must be at least 8 characters in length.

ChangePinView.currentPasswordRequired: Your current passphrase is required to set or change your PIN
ChangePinView.description: Your Transaction PIN is used as an extra safety measure. It is required if a transaction value is higher than the threshold MOB amount.
ChangePinView.instructions: To change your PIN or to create one, enter the desired PIN value below, and the minimum amount it applies to, as well.
ChangePinView.pinThreshold: Minimum amount that requires a PIN
ChangePinView.pinSize: PIN must be at least 6 characters long.

CloseApp.explain: The ledger isn't completely synchronized. Do you want to leave the process synchronizing in the background?
CloseApp.yes: Yes, let it run and close

CloseWalletModal.closeVerifyBody: Do you want to close and secure the wallet?

ConfigureFullServiceView.daemonDescription: Full-Service is a standalone executable which provides blockchain synchronization and wallet services.
ConfigureFullServiceView.daemonDescriptionContinued: It creates encrypted, attested connections to validator nodes that participate in federated voting for agreements on current block height, block headers, and to submitting transactions. These validator nodes are considered highly trusted due to their use of SGX, and they are used as a reliable source for block information, as well as for validating and processing the proposed transactions from Full-Service.
ConfigureFullServiceView.panelDescription: This screen shows how to customize the behavior of background ledger processor (named Full-Service) as well as how to perform some basic resets.

ConsumeGiftForm.confirmation: Gift Received. Your balance will update shortly.
ConsumeGiftForm.giftB58Error: Could not find gift with code.
ConsumeGiftForm.giftB58Validation: You need a valid gift code to open a gift.
ConsumeGiftForm.giftClaimed: This gift has already been claimed!

ConsumeGiftPanel.title: Open Gifts of MOB
ConsumeGiftPanel.description: Use this form to collect gift codes. Enter the gift code and confirm you want to accept the gift into your wallet.

CreateAccountForm.acceptTerms: I have read and accept the
CreateAccountForm.acceptTermsFormHelper: You must read the Terms of Use before using the wallet.
CreateAccountForm.accountNameValidation: Account Name cannot be more than 64 characters.
CreateAccountForm.checkedTermsValidation: You must accept Terms of Use to use wallet.
CreateAccountForm.passwordMax: Passphrases cannot be more than 99 characters.
CreateAccountForm.passwordMin: Passphrase must be at least 8 characters in length.

CreateAccountView.description: This option is best for individuals who do not have an existing account. If you have an account you would like to use, please import an existing account instead.
CreateAccountView.header: Create a new account for this desktop wallet.
CreateAccountView.overwriteWarning: It appears that this wallet is locked with an account. Creating an account will override the wallet. Please ensure that you have secured the existing account's Entropy if you wish to change accounts.
CreateAccountView.title: Create Account

HistoryView.emptyState: You don't have any transactions yet!

ImportAccountForm.acceptTerms: I have read and accept the
ImportAccountForm.acceptTermsFormHelper: You must read the Terms of Use before using the wallet.
ImportAccountForm.accountNameValidation: Account Name cannot be more than 64 characters.
ImportAccountForm.checkedTermsValidation: You must accept Terms of Use to use wallet.
ImportAccountForm.entropyMatches: A valid Entropy is 12 or more words separated by spaces, or 64 hexadecimals.
ImportAccountForm.passwordMax: Passphrases cannot be more than 99 characters.
ImportAccountForm.passwordMin: Passphrase must be at least 8 characters in length.

ImportAccountView.description: This option is best for individuals who already have MobileCoin accounts. If you do not have an account, please create a new account instead.
ImportAccountView.header: Import an existing account for this desktop wallet.
ImportAccountView.legacyHex: New wallets should have an Entropy with 24 mnemonic words. Legacy wallets use 64 hex characters. Please do not convert these values. Else, you will import the wrong account and have 0 balance.
ImportAccountView.overwriteWarning: It appears that this wallet is locked with an account. Importing an account will override the wallet. Please ensure that you have secured the existing account's Entropy if you wish to change accounts.
ImportAccountView.title: Import Account
ImportAccountView.warning: You should not actively use the same account on multiple wallets if you want to preserve your local history.

InactivityDetect.confirmToStay: For your privacy, this app will close if left inactive.
InactivityDetect.title: Closing because of inactivity
InactivityDetect.tooLong: You have been inactive too long...

LeaveFullServiceRunning.defaultDescription: By default, Full-Service terminates when you exit the wallet. This setting allows you to leave Full-Service syncing as a background process. It is best to keep the ledger synced to avoid delays in transactions or balance fetches.
LeaveFullServiceRunning.ternaryWillNotSync: Full-Service will not continue to sync when you exit the wallet.
LeaveFullServiceRunning.ternaryWillSync: Full-Service will continue to sync when you exit the wallet.

LedgerStatus.accountBlocksDescription: Account Blocks shows the blocks that a specific Account has synced. Each account has its own Account Blocks sync. Once this value is synced, you will immediately see the effects of transactions.
LedgerStatus.localBlocksDescription: Local Blocks shows the blocks your Full-Service has downloaded from ledger.
LedgerStatus.networkBlocksDescription: Network Blocks represent the total blocks within the MobileCoin Network. This is the value your Local Blocks and Account Blocks must equal the total amount of Network Blocks to be synced 100 percent.
LedgerStatus.statusCopyBelow90: The ledger is syncing. This may take awhile.
LedgerStatus.statusCopyError: There's been an error in the ledger. Please reset the ledger at the bottom of this page.

NotFoundView.description: You should never see this page. If you do, an engineer messed up.
NotFoundView.header: 404: The page you are looking for is not here

ReceiveMobPanel.assignedAddressDetails: If you want a record of your transaction history, you may create a new contact. Each new contact will have their own, unique public address. You can give this new contact an alias and abbreviation. A contact doesn’t have to be an individual, you can share it with businesses, groups, or even treat it as another public address. At rest, your contacts are encrypted, and they never leave your local device.
ReceiveMobPanel.howToReceiveDetails: To receive MOB, you must give the sender an address for your account. You may use your Public Address or an Assigned Address (assigned to the sender).
ReceiveMobPanel.mainPublicAddressDetails: Your Public Address can be shared with everyone. The sender will be unknown to the wallet. This is a feature, not a bug. If you do not care about explicit transaction history, or if you purposely want to keep your history ambiguous, use this address.

RetrieveEntropyView.description: that unlocks your wallet and allows you to use MOB. It is unique to your account. Never share this code. Use this code in a secure, safe manner.
RetrieveEntropyView.entropyCanBeUsed: The Entropy can be used to import your wallet in case your device is damaged or lost. It also allows you to add your account to other wallets.
RetrieveEntropyView.misplacedYourEntropy: If you have forgotten or misplaced your Entropy, you may retrieve it here with your passphrase.

SendMobForm.addressRequired: A Public Address is required to send MOB.
SendMobForm.enterPin: For this amount your PIN is required
SendMobForm.errorFee: Please reserve 0.01 MOB for transaction fee.
SendMobForm.intent: Please check and confirm your payment amount
SendMobForm.mustSync: Wallet must sync with ledger before sending MOB.
SendMobForm.positiveValidation: A positive, non-zero amount is required to send MOB.
SendMobForm.positiveValidationRequired: A positive, non-zero amount is required to send MOB.

SendMobPanel.title: Send MOB to an Address
SendMobPanel.description: Please enter the recipient’s address and the amount of MOB to send

SetPinModal.description: Your Transaction PIN is used as an extra safety measure. It is required if a transaction value is higher than the threshold MOB amount.
SetPinModal.instructions: To change your PIN or to create one, enter the desired PIN value below, and the minimum amount it applies to, as well.
SetPinModal.pinThreshold: Minimum amount that requires a PIN
SetPinModal.pinSize: PIN must be at least 6 characters long.

ShowEntropyModal.description: We generated a random Entropy to create your new account. Please store this code in a secure, private manner. You will need your Entropy to import this account into other wallets.
ShowEntropyModal.header: Welcome to the MobileCoin Desktop Wallet!
ShowEntropyModal.recommend: We recommend storing your Entropy in a secure manner.
ShowEntropyModal.retrieve: If you need to see your Entropy again, you may retrieve it from the Settings tab with your passphrase. However, if you forget your passphrase or lose this device, you will need to know your Entropy.
ShowEntropyModal.yes: Yes, I have secured my Entropy

ShowRetrievedEntropyModal.description: We decrypted your Entropy and will now show you the code on your screen. Please store this code in a secure, private manner. You will need your Entropy to import this account into other wallets.

SyncStatus.error: Please see Admin Panel in Settings.

TransactionDetails.orphanedExplaination: This transaction is considered orphaned. This means that the assigned address that received this transaction is unknown to this wallet. This likely happens if you assign addresses for this account within other wallets. Other causes may be importing/recovering this account. We recommend to only use an account in a single wallet.
TransactionDetails.recoveryInstructions: To recover this transaction, you can manually add contacts until you re-assign the lost address. Later updates to this wallet will include a less manual recovery process!

UnlockWalletView.description: Please enter the passphrase you used to secure your wallet.
UnlockWalletView.title: Unlock Wallet
